metadata.title: Campari and Grapefruit Sorbet
metadata.description: A refreshing and party-like sorbet that can be served at various points during a meal.
notes: Use ruby red grapefruit for color and sweetness.
Can be served with Prosecco, as a palate-cleanser, or with Chocolate-coated Ruby Red Grapefruit Peel.
Store grapefruit peel in the fridge for up to 3 days if not using immediately.
metadata.author: Yotam Ottolenghi

steps.action: Cut each grapefruit in half and remove the flesh.

output_state.name: Grapefruit flesh
output_state.description: Grapefruit flesh removed from the peel.

steps.action: Place the grapefruit flesh in a blender or food processor and blend until the grapefruit is crushed.

output_state.name: Crushed grapefruit flesh
output_state.description: Grapefruit flesh blended into a crushed consistency.

steps.action: Strain the crushed grapefruit flesh into a bowl through a fine-mesh sieve to extract the juice.

output_state.name: Grapefruit juice
output_state.description: 500ml of grapefruit juice extracted from the crushed flesh.

steps.action: Add the lemon and orange juice to the grapefruit juice and mix together.

output_state.name: Mixed fruit juices
output_state.description: Grapefruit, lemon, and orange juices combined into a single mixture.

steps.action: Pour 250ml of the mixed fruit juices into a small saucepan with the sugar.

output_state.name: Juice and sugar mixture
output_state.description: 250ml of mixed fruit juices combined with 200g of caster sugar.

steps.action: Heat the saucepan over a low heat, stirring until the sugar is dissolved, then set aside to cool for 10 minutes.

output_state.name: Dissolved sugar mixture
output_state.description: Sugar fully dissolved in the juice mixture and cooled.

steps.action: Pour the dissolved sugar mixture into the remaining juice, add the Campari, and chill completely.

output_state.name: Chilled sorbet base
output_state.description: Chilled mixture of juices, sugar, and Campari ready for churning.

steps.action: Transfer the chilled sorbet base to an ice cream maker and churn until soft waves form.

output_state.name: Churned sorbet
output_state.description: Sorbet base churned into a soft, frozen consistency.

steps.action: Transfer the sorbet to a container, cover with cling film, and seal the container.

output_state.name: Sealed sorbet
output_state.description: Sorbet stored in a container with cling film to prevent ice particles from forming.

steps.action: Freeze the sorbet until firm enough to scoop into a glass and serve.

output_state.name: Campari and Grapefruit Sorbet
output_state.description: Firm, frozen sorbet ready to be scooped and served.

final_state.name: Campari and Grapefruit Sorbet
final_state.description: Firm, frozen sorbet ready to be scooped and served.
